body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Johnson's Travel Agency. My name is Vincent Johnson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Crystal Wood.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's nice to meet you, Crystal. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have experienced poor food quality during my recent hotel stay.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Crystal. Can you provide me with your room number and the name of the hotel, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My room number was two zero three and I stayed at the Harbor View Hotel.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, Crystal. I will look into this matter for you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Crystal. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your assistance.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out, Crystal. Have a great day!
